pages.text: The Golden Heart grants the player the Absorption effect. When the effect is about to run out, it is applied again, resetting the amount of remaining absorption hearts. It has a side-effect of making piglins neutral. This curio can (rarely) be found in bastion treasure chests.

The Golden Heart supports the following enchantments:$(br2)$(l)Protection$(): Max health given by this curio is increased slightly per level$(br2)$(l)Efficiency$(): Absorption hearts take slightly less time to regenerate per level$(br2)$(l)Curse of Chromatic Twisting$(): Upon being attacked by a mob, both the wearer and the attacker receive the Wither potion effect
